attributes.action: Refrain from interference in the due process of law to exclude the issue of warrants for the arrest of Israeli politicians for war crimes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THe UK government proposes amending the law to ensure warrants for the arrest of Israeli politicians for war crimes cannot be issued. It is for the courts and the justice system to decide when a warrant can be issued - not politicians  Political interference in the justice system undermines democracy and makes a mockery of equality before the law.
